SELECT gp.PRG_NO as prgNo, gp.PRG_NM as prgNm, gs.PRG_YMD as prgYmd, gs.PRG_HR as prgHr, gp.PRG_PLACE as prgPlace FROM graply ga JOIN grschedule gs ON ga.grsch_no = gs.GRSCH_NO JOIN grprograms gp ON gs.PRG_NO = gp.PRG_NO WHERE ga.stud_no = #{stud_no} GROUP BY gp.PRG_NO, gp.PRG_NM, gs.PRG_YMD, gs.PRG_HR, gp.PRG_PLACE ORDER BY gp.PRG_NO;
